name: Rina Suzuki
occupation: college student / part-time maid cafe worker

hair.style: shoulder-length, often in twin tails or high ponytail, playful styling

appearance.facial_features: cute round face, button nose, frequent playful smiles and winks, dimples when smiling, youthful appearance
appearance.distinctive_features: energetic movements, expressive facial expressions, playful body language, often bouncing or skipping

personality.approach_to_takeshi: constant playful teasing, physical pranks with intimate undertones, wearing provocative outfits 'accidentally', creating games with flirty rewards, keeping him guessing her intentions
personality.communication_style: upbeat, uses cute speech patterns, lots of giggles, playful nicknames, teasing remarks with innocent face
romantic_tactics: playful physical contact disguised as accidents
wearing revealing maid cafe uniform at home 'for practice'
creating silly games with intimate forfeits

background.history: Tokyo native, studying psychology at local university, works part-time at popular maid cafe to pay for tuition and have fun
background.why_lives_here: Moved in 6 months ago to be closer to university and cafe, loves the shared living dynamic
background.relationship_with_takeshi: Immediately found him interesting, sees him as fun to tease but also genuinely cares about cheering him up
background.financial_situation: Scraping by on part-time work and small allowance from parents, spends money on cute clothes and anime merchandise
background.family: Middle-class Tokyo family, younger sister still in high school, parents are supportive but worry about her
background.secrets: Actually quite intelligent despite airhead act, has crush on Takeshi but hides it behind teasing, collects dating sim games

daily_routine.morning: 8:00 AM wake up (often late), rushes to get ready, quick breakfast while chatting energetically
daily_routine.day: University classes, studying at cafes, occasional maid cafe shifts, hangs out with friends
daily_routine.evening: Returns home 6-8 PM depending on shift, changes into comfortable cute clothes, plays games or watches anime
daily_routine.night: Often stays up late gaming or studying, sneaks snacks from kitchen, goes to bed around 1 AM

casual_home: oversized hoodies with short shorts barely visible
crop tops with pleated mini skirts
loose t-shirts showing shoulders and thighs
maid_cafe_uniform: classic maid outfit with short skirt and apron
variations including cat ear maid, bunny maid
going_out: trendy street fashion with crop tops
clothing_style.color_preferences: pink, pastels, white, light blue, vibrant colors
clothing_style.accessories: hair clips and ribbons, cute earrings, phone charms, temporary tattoos

typical_scenarios: Greeting him at door in maid outfit offering 'welcome home master' service
Challenging him to video games with intimate forfeits
Asking for help with 'stuck' zippers that aren't really stuck
Practicing 'maid service' on him as training
Accidental wardrobe malfunctions in his presence
Playful wrestling that becomes physical contact
Sending teasing selfies with suggestive captions
interactions_with_takeshi.escalation_pattern: Starts with silly jokes and pranks, gradually increases physical contact through games, uses innocent excuses for revealing situations, builds to more direct flirtation while maintaining playful deniability
interactions_with_takeshi.relationship_dynamics: Little sister who's actually romantic interest, playful banter hiding genuine feelings, keeps him off-balance between friend and flirt

generation_prompts.visual_description: Cute Japanese girl, age 22, college student, maid cafe worker, playful mischievous expression, bright hazel eyes with teasing sparkle, shoulder-length light brown hair with blonde highlights in twin tails or ponytail, petite curvy figure with large bust, wearing revealing cute outfit like maid uniform or crop top with short skirt, photorealistic anime style, bright cheerful lighting, Tokyo apartment or cafe background

character_specific_prompts.maid_cafe_uniform: Rina Suzuki in maid cafe uniform with short frilly skirt and apron, thigh-high stockings, playful wink, hand on hip pose, teasing smile, cute and flirty, bright cafe lighting, serving pose
character_specific_prompts.playful_home_outfit: Rina Suzuki in oversized hoodie and short shorts, playful expression, jumping or energetic pose, twin tails bouncing, showing curves, Tokyo apartment living room, afternoon light
character_specific_prompts.teasing_moment: Rina Suzuki in crop top and mini skirt, mischievous grin, leaning forward playfully, finger on lips in cute gesture, bright eyes, intimate distance, casual setting
character_specific_prompts.gaming_session: Rina Suzuki in comfortable tank top and shorts, sitting cross-legged with game controller, excited expression, casual home clothes, evening lighting, cozy atmosphere

voice_profile.speech_pattern: uses cute speech patterns, lots of 'ne~', 'ehehe', playful exclamations
catchphrases: Master, your wish is my command~
You're no fun when you're so serious!

project_context.protagonist: Takeshi Sato (broke, in debt to yakuza)
project_context.character_role: playful teaser roommate, provides comic relief and tension through constant flirtation and games
project_context.story_arc: Uses playful teasing to cheer up Takeshi, gradually reveals genuine feelings beneath the games, relationship develops from playful to romantic
project_context.relationship_progression: annoying playful neighbor → fun gaming buddy → flirty friend → romantic partner
